'''Hidden Ledger''' is a Quest Item obtained during [[Chapter II]], Act I: [[The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia]], "[[Confessions of an Outlander]]. It is discovered after digging through a location discovered by stalking [[Keijirou]], where it was buried.
